alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:28PM EDT until June 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Southern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 627 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Wateree State Park, or 13 miles northeast of Winnsboro, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Camden, Lake Wateree Dam, Kershaw, Heath Springs, Lugoff, Westville, Liberty Hill, Elgin, Lake Carolina, Mt Pisgah, Longtown, Goodale State Park, Lake Wateree State Park, Blythewood, Ridgeway, North Central High School, Bell Town Fire Station, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Mitford and Faith Christian School. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 82 and 100. Interstate 77 between mile markers 26 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
